013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
017
018import java.util.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
022
023/**
024 * TODO
025 */
026@Bean(properties="schema,example,examples,encoding,*")
027@FluentSetters
028public class MediaType extends OpenApiElement{
029   private SchemaInfo schema;
030   private Object example;
031   private Map<String,Example> examples;
032   private Map<String,Encoding> encoding;
033
034   /**
035    * Default constructor.
036    */
037   public MediaType() { }
038
039   /**
040    * Copy constructor.
041    *
042    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
043    */
044   public MediaType(MediaType copyFrom) {
045      super(copyFrom);
046
047      this.schema = copyFrom.schema;
048      this.example = copyFrom.example;
049      this.examples = copyOf(copyFrom.examples, Example::copy);
050      this.encoding = copyOf(copyFrom.encoding, Encoding::copy);
051   }
052
053   /**
054    * Make a deep copy of this object.
055    *
056    * @return A deep copy of this object.
057    */
058   public MediaType copy() {
059      return new MediaType(this);
060   }
061
062   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
063   protected MediaType strict() {
064      super.strict();
065      return this;
066   }
067
068   /**
069    * Bean property getter:  <property>schema</property>.
070    *
071    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
072    */
073   public SchemaInfo getSchema() {
074      return schema;
075   }
076
077   /**
078    * Bean property setter:  <property>schema</property>.
079    *
080    * @param value
081    *    The new value for this property.
082    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
083    * @return This object
084    */
085   public MediaType setSchema(SchemaInfo value) {
086      schema = value;
087      return this;
088   }
089
090   /**
091    * Bean property getter:  <property>x-example</property>.
092    *
093    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
094    */
095   @Beanp("x-example")
096   public Object getExample() {
097      return example;
098   }
099
100   /**
101    * Bean property setter:  <property>examples</property>.
102    *
103    * @param value
104    *    The new value for this property.
105    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
106    * @return This object
107    */
108   @Beanp("x-example")
109   public MediaType setExample(Object value) {
110      example = value;
111      return this;
112   }
113
114   /**
115    * Bean property getter:  <property>variables</property>.
116    *
117    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
118    */
119   public Map<String, Encoding> getEncoding() {
120      return encoding;
121   }
122
123   /**
124    * Bean property setter:  <property>variables</property>.
125    *
126    * @param value
127    *    The new value for this property.
128    * @return This object
129    */
130   public MediaType setEncoding(Map<String, Encoding> value) {
131      encoding = copyOf(value);
132      return this;
133   }
134
135   /**
136    * Adds one or more values to the <property>variables</property> property.
137    *
138    * @param key The mapping key.
139    * @param value
140    *    The values to add to this property.
141    *    <br>Ignored if <jk>null</jk>.
142    * @return This object
143    */
144   public MediaType addEncoding(String key, Encoding value) {
145      encoding = mapBuilder(encoding).sparse().add(key, value).build();
146      return this;
147   }
148
149   /**
150    * Bean property getter:  <property>examples</property>.
151    *
152    * <p>
153    * The list of possible responses as they are returned from executing this operation.
154    *
155    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
156    */
157   public Map<String,Example> getExamples() {
158      return examples;
159   }
160
161   /**
162    * Bean property setter:  <property>headers</property>.
163    *
164    * <p>
165    * A list of examples that are sent with the response.
166    *
167    * @param value
168    *    The new value for this property.
169    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
170    * @return This object
171    */
172   public MediaType setExamples(Map<String,Example> value) {
173      examples = copyOf(value);
174      return this;
175   }
176
177   /**
178    * Adds a single value to the <property>examples</property> property.
179    *
180    * @param name The example name.
181    * @param example The example.
182    * @return This object
183    */
184   public MediaType addExample(String name, Example example) {
185      examples = mapBuilder(examples).add(name, example).build();
186      return this;
187   }
188
189   // <FluentSetters>
190
191   // </FluentSetters>
192
193   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
194   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
195      if (property == null)
196         return null;
197      return switch (property) {
198         case "schema" -> toType(getSchema(), type);
199         case "example" -> toType(getExample(), type);
200         case "examples" -> toType(getExamples(), type);
201         case "encoding" -> toType(getEncoding(), type);
202         default -> super.get(property, type);
203      };
204   }
205
206   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
207   public MediaType set(String property, Object value) {
208      if (property == null)
209         return this;
210      return switch (property) {
211         case "schema" -> setSchema(toType(value, SchemaInfo.class));
212         case "example" -> setExample(value);
213         case "examples" -> setExamples(mapBuilder(String.class,Example.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
214         case "encoding" -> setEncoding(mapBuilder(String.class,Encoding.class).sparse().addAny(value).build());
215         default -> {
216            super.set(property, value);
217            yield this;
218         }
219      };
220   }
221
222   @Override /* OpenApiElement */
223   public Set<String> keySet() {
224      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
225         .addIf(schema != null, "schema")
226         .addIf(example != null, "example")
227         .addIf(encoding != null, "encoding")
228         .addIf(examples != null, "examples")
229         .build();
230      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
231   }
232}
